name: Last Seed
description:
In the year 2099, the planet is dying and the world’s air supply is low. You, Agent Navy Blue, have to find the last seed to grow real trees and fight the battle of CO2 emissions. The evil organization that is selling artificial air has set traps in order to deter you from completing your missions. You must get the job done before your air supplies are finished.

CONTROLS:

WASD = Movement

SPACE = Jump

Mouse Click = Push Wooden Blocks
